A theorem used in elimination of disjoint variable restriction on ` x ` and ` y ` by replacing it with a distinctor ` -. A. x x = z ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Oct-2018.)

 A theorem used in elimination of disjoint variable restriction on ` x ` and ` y ` by replacing it with a distinctor ` -. A. x x = z ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof rewitten by Jim Kingdon, 24-Feb-2018.)
statement:
sbal1 $p |- ( -. A. x x = z -> ( [ z / y ] A. x ph <-> A. x [ z / y ] ph ) ) $.
$d x y $.
